001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.util.Log;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.View;
007import android.view.ViewGroup;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
012import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.adapter.RowsAdapter;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.databinding.FragmentPatternReaderBinding;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.viewmodel.PatternLibraryViewModel;
016
017/**
018 * This {@link Fragment} holds the logic for the {@link PatternReaderFragment} that the user will
019 * use to read a {@code pattern} that they selected from the {@link PatternLibraryFragment}.
020 */
021@AndroidEntryPoint
022public class PatternReaderFragment extends Fragment {
023
024  private FragmentPatternReaderBinding binding;
025  private PatternLibraryViewModel viewModel;
026  private long patternId;
027
028  @Override
029  public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container,
030      Bundle savedInstanceState) {
031    binding = FragmentPatternReaderBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
032    patternId = PatternReaderFragmentArgs.fromBundle(getArguments()).getPatternId();
033    binding = FragmentPatternReaderBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
034    return binding.getRoot();
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
039    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
040    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(PatternLibraryViewModel.class);
041    viewModel.getPattern().observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (pattern) -> {
042      Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), "fetched pattern " + pattern.getPatternName());
043      RowsAdapter adapter = new RowsAdapter(requireContext(), pattern.getRows());
044      binding.rows.setAdapter(adapter);
045    });
046
047    viewModel.fetchPattern(patternId);
048  }
049}
